mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.body, n.picture as pic, n.createtime as createTime, n.createplace as createPlace, n.isadoptionnews as isAdoptionNews, CASE when n.animaltype = 1 then '狗' when n.animaltype = 2 then '猫' end as type, an.`name` as animalName, n.isadoptionnews as isAdoptionNews, n.zan, n.createuserid as userId, u.username as userName FROM news n LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON n.createuserid = u.id LEFT JOIN animal an on an.id = n.dogorcattype WHERE n.id = #{id} and n.isdel = 0
